en: "Sierterm is an R&D Project funded by the Universidad Europea de Madrid for a year with the aim of creating a terminological trilingual glossary (terminology records) for translators working in the fields of Intelligent Systems and Renewable Energies. More specifically, Sierterm concentrates on: • Compiling documents for term identification and extraction. • Uploading these terms into a collaborative platform that allows for public access and collaboration."
